Text:
The only difference between your image and my rip is that this one is about 10 times smaller and has better quality because of de-interlacing. Why would you waste 3,71gb on 32 minutes of film? You have some cool other rips though. Downloaded the speed to fly and neverending thermal a while ago, awesome movies.
